getEmployeeBasicInfo.description: Retrieve basic information about an employee by their ID.

lastChanged.description: Full timestamp of the last change to the employee record.

getEmployeeBasicInfo.title: Get Basic Info

getEmployeeCustomInfo.description: Retrieve custom information about an employee by their ID and specified fields.

fields.description: List of custom field names to retrieve for the employee.

getEmployeeCustomInfo.title: Get Custom Info

listEmployees.description: Retrieve a list of all employees with IDs and names. Warning: this endpoint may not be enabled in your workspace.

employees.description: List of employees in the directory. Includes only ID and display name.

listEmployees.title: List Employees

employeeCreated.description: Triggers when a new employee is created in BambooHR.
employeeCreated.title: Employee Created

employeeDeleted.description: Triggers when an employee is deleted from BambooHR. Terminating employees will trigger the "Employee Updated" event instead.
employeeDeleted.title: Employee Deleted

employeeUpdated.description: Triggers when an existing employee is updated in BambooHR.

changedFields.description: List of fields that were changed in this event.

fields.description: All fields subscribed to for the employee, including unchanged fields.

employeeUpdated.title: Employee Updated

schema.description: Parameters required to authenticate via OAuth. Not required if using API Key.

accessToken.description: Temporary access token for the API.

expiresAt.description: Timestamp (in ms from epoch) at which the token expires.

refreshToken.description: Token used to refresh the access token.

anyOf.description: The ID of the webhook as provided by BambooHR when the webhook was created.
The private key provided by BambooHR to validate the webhook.
